message.content:
cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CG. 

The paper deals with error-correcting codes and their properties, which is a topic in theoretical computer science. The use of polynomials and grids suggests a connection to computational complexity (cs.CC) and information theory (cs.IT). The focus on local decoding and testing suggests a connection to data structures (cs.DS) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The use of hypercontractivity and symmetries suggests a connection to computational geometry (cs.CG).
